content.detailedDescription:
I had dismissed this because i thought there was a reasonable explenation for this, but then i read online another ufo report just like this and in the same county around the same time i saw mine.

it was dark out i was walking to a 7/11 on corbin and vanowen, going east about a block away. i looked up and saw a red fireball with like an amber glow around it shooting about east across the sky though i think it vanished towards the end because i had looked away for a split second and looked up and there was nothing. it was very large and bright, not an airplane but looked to me like what a satelite or some kind of missile would look like as it burned and streaked. it was breaking up and had 2 larger chunks trailing behind slightly spreading as it went. it was too slow for a comet or a meteorite and too low in altitude as well, but not any aircraft. it was very bright like an led. and it had a glowing like tail like a comet. i thought it was a plane blowing up, but never heard or read anything in the news about it. just a matching ufo report so i thought id share. thanks
content.summary: It was like a missile or a burning satellite in the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed reading a novel when three spheres were floating in the sky.I got a better view of the u.F.O. when it started streaking across the sky. i lost sight of the red blue and yellow balls. felt frightened and scared.
content.summary: 3 different floating balls

content.detailedDescription:
My wife seen these lights north of town.  pics were taken by seperate witness on the east side of the town.  these pics would also be south 
of where my wife had viewed the event.
content.summary: Lights and possible craft near washington,  in.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home from plymouth maine as we had come up to visit,between clinton almost to farmington i saw a green light out of the corner of my eye when i looked up we saw an object at least 16 feet across ,i pointed it out to my wife at which time it went completely black then like a dimmer switch on a light the green color came back,we were right under it it was at the top of an enormous pine tree and it seemed to dwarfe it i went to stop and my wife punched me she later told me she was very scared of what would happen if we stopped.We observed it do this color change three times before it was out of our mirror then she told me i could go back,one other thing to mention a state trooper had someone pulled over about 3 miles down the road,anyone who knows this stretch of interstate know how flat and long it is.It appeared the object was observing the state trooper.I personally was more curious than scared.If anyone else has seen anything loke this please post it.One things for sure if i see it again or anything like it i will stop and we always carry a camera with us.
content.summary: Driving south on i-95 when my wife and i saw a u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription: Summer of 2009, new orleans area, metairie to be exact. it was about 5:00pm not even dark yet. i walked outside to sit on the deck to smoke a cig.  not much to look at around here, except for neighboring houses, so i usually look up at the sky, (cloud watching, or weather watching), when i then noticed a triangular ufo w/ lights on each angle, and a circular looking bluish light/thing in the middle. it was flying ese.  i was amazed and couldnt keep my eyes off of it.  it was flying waaay too high in the sky to be an airplane. it made no sound, and lost sight after about a minute due to a nearby tree.
content.summary: Triangular ufo- lights on each angle- circular bluish light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside after dark smoking when i noticed what looked like an airplane flying over. there was a blinking white light coming from the north east heading south west. what caught my attention was that this wasn't blinking like an airplane every second. it would blink only about every 30 seconds, much brighter than a normal airplane. after blinking 4 or 5 times as is crossed the night sky, it lit up to a solid white dot much brighter than a star, slowed down and stopped. 

my wife and i watched this thing closely for the next 2 hours. we saw multiple orbs come and go from the bottom of whatever this light was. it seemed to roll and turn occasionally. there were red lights on each side of it that would blink very quickly about once every 60 seconds. it only moved about an inch at arm���s length from side to side slowly about twice while it was visible. 

this was not a star. this was not a satellite or a planet. this thing lit up and stopped in the sky and stayed there, looking like a planet. our dogs, the neighbor���s dogs, the neighbor���s donkey and the coyotes were all barking and braying at the same time it first appeared as a solid light. 

the light never moved much after that. it just drifted behind the tree line like the rest of the stars.
content.summary: Blinking light moves across sky, turns to solid light, slows down and stops/

content.detailedDescription:
I am just back from vacation in tucson arizona. while there my sister and i saw a ufo that looked like an on comming airplane at night but that dropped two "star like " objects that were under someones control as the first one dropped and hovered, then went east a ways then turned back west again and quickly came back to where it was.

since this report is not about that, i will refer you to the report i made from tucson to you. submitted jan 5th 2011. i talked to a gentleman from mufon in arizona about this sighting, and during the conversation mentioned this sighting from the internet on a web cam set up in the middle of no where.

i am submitting the screen shot of what i got. the gentleman asked me to send it in when i got back to texas so i am doing so. it appears that this was takin back in 2003 about the time i got my first computer. i stumbled upon the fact that there were web cams set up over the world and some in weird places, this one was in a remote location but i dont know where. as well the original picture looked a bit sharper to me but you can zoom in and see that it does not look like a plane. this web cam took still shots once every minute, at first nothing was there, then in the next shot it was.

i am in no way making a claim that this object is extra terrestrial. but for this sighting and the one in tucson, i have never seen anything in the sky i could not identify.  in any case i wanted to follow thru and send in the screen shot of a printed page and picture. i wish i had kept the screen shot and not printed it, as it adds grain to the shot. i will search my old computer that was used then and try to find the original if i can.    thanks, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo spotted on a web cam

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at approx. 6:30 a.M. on thursday, jan. 13, 2011 and looked out the bathroom window (facing north) to see if it was snowing.  i saw what i thought was an airplane in the northern sky. since we live near metcalf airfield, thought it was just another private plane coming in for a landing. as it came closer, it looked too large to be an airplane and it looked to be triangular, with white lights all around it.  then at one time as i watched it, the lights went out and red lights came on for a few seconds, then they went out and white lights came on again. i didn't hear any sound. i watched it until it passed over our house and headed south, but did not see it overhead to get a better description, since it was too cold to go outside and observe.  

i drew a sketch of what i saw to the best of my ability.  if it was an airplane with lights around it, it would have to have been travelling tail-end first heading south because of the way the lights were around it and the way it was moving.  i faxed the sketch copy to lake twp. police and i don't know if it was ever determined to be an aircraft.  having lived in this area for over 40 years, i see airplanes very often in the sky at night and early morning, but this was definitely different.
content.summary: Triangular shaped aircraft cruising above with white lights around it, changing to red, then white.

content.detailedDescription: Walking to work,about 6am, when i noticed sky 'glowing', looked up and saw bright light, lighting up the sky.  looked like a 'planet', larger than stars. thought it was a planet. it continued to 'glow' and light up sky, no beams, just bright glow, then the object rose upward to above 'plane' height, then higher, blacking out as it rose and becoming luminous again several times until it was out of sight 'beyond the stars', about 20 min. time involved. there was no cloud cover to explain the disappearing and re-appearing of the object so i assumed it was offing it's own luminescence. i called a family member from the area to see if she could see it from her point in the area, but it wasn't visible to her from house windows but she couldn't see the sky above the house before it was gone. i took a picture of it with my camera but will have to forward that picture to you later.  was wondering if you had any other reports of such in the near area?
content.summary: Larger n brighter than stars, moving outward, random stop/blackout/glowing til disappeared, no other light color

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work on kingshighway south in st. louis city, close to my house i suddenly realized there were two steady lights almost directly in front of me, just to the left, just a little up into the sky as if it might be a low flying helicopter, about a nickel's diameter in relative size. "as the crow flies" they would have been over my house. i hadn't noticed it come into my field of vision, but suddenly noticed that they were moving very slowly, left to right, although they curiously appeared to be a possible plane banking to the left - but moving right? the lights were not blinking, were definitely white circles or spheres, and there were no faa required green nor red lights visible now nor during the entire sighting. kingshighway is two lanes in each direction and the road was very busy with evening commuters like me, so the sighting was via multiple short looks while driving safely. i shortly noticed a small circle of light appear just by the right light, slowly "descending" into an equilateral triangle position relative to the other two lights, and became the same size as them. the triangle of lights then appeared to slowly "elongate." i was figuring i was seeing single craft with lights that was changing its orientation while traveling, so i'm still thinking some kind of helicopter when a small fourth circle of light starts to appear between the two "rear" lights. while that light became slightly larger, but not as large as the other three lights, two "lines" of light started to appear between each of the rear circles. those lines also became slightly longer, while the "front" circle became a thick white line having "grown" back some. during the perhaps two minutes of the sighting, the object(s) seemed to get slightly closer where it seemed a craft had slowly curved along the sky while i was driving. i started losing it in the trees and buildings almost directly right of me when the object got there. most of the sighting i could see the object out my front windshield, but when i had to look out my right passenger window i deviated from my course and took a right to try to get a better look. i was now driving residential city side streets that are rutted with snow and ice - i glimpsed it only a few short times and quickly lost it through the neighborhood trees and houses.

getting home about three minutes later, i parked my car in my driveway and started walking to my front stairs and suddenly i heard a plane start to fly by from my left, coming from behind my house from over the large cemetery across the street. i could clearly hear jet engines but saw an incongruent triangle of steady red lights with a blinking white light between them! i see planes go by my house ever day, being about six miles from the international airport, but i've never seen a plane with all its tipped beacon lights steady red with a bottom blinking white beacon. i continued walking up my stairs and stood and watched for about 30 seconds until i lost it in the nearby trees and homes, never changing that lighting configuration. ironically, this plane came from the direction where white lights were when i lost them about three minutes before.

i've attached a created representation of the changing of the white lights, and punctuated it with the plane i saw when i got home. when i got in i discovered that one of my computer's main disk drives had failed :(
content.summary: Two lights slowly move from front left to right and more lights appear

content.detailedDescription: I had been walking around the area of the rialto bridge in venice on the evening of 8 dec 2008. sunset had occurred around 5 pm local time. the day had been overcast with periods of light rain. i had just finished crossing the rialto bridge moving southeast and was walking along the canal side to the northeast. i had been taking some night pictures of the holiday lights using my nikon coolpix l20 camera. as i worked my way away from the foot of the bridge about 100 yards, i noticed the people around me looking up. as i looked up and to the west i noticed a group of three objects at approximately 500 feet above the city moving west to east. the objects emitted no audible sound and were changing color from orange to red. the objects were in formation, one behind the other and separated by 20 feet. the objects' shape were roughly globe shaped, somewhat like a chinese lantern. the first group of three past to the east with no sound of any kind. nor were there any contrail or smoke. no smell of exhaust such as jet fuel was evident. a second group of three again approached from the west and at the same height of as the first. with the second group i had the presence of mind to lock on the middle object and pan with it as it passed. the resulting picture is attached here. again as with the first set of three there were no sounds associated with the object, no smoke or contrail. thinking the display was over, i started back towards the bridge and was at the foot of it when a third set of objects passed directly over the bridge. in total nine objects were observed, but no sound was associated with them. no engine noise, no rotor noise as with a heilo, no exhaust, no smoke or contrail. after the initial surprise of the objects, i simply watched as the objects flew in a straight line over the area and disappeared to the east.
content.summary: 3 groups of 3 objects each passing over venice 8 dec 2008

content.detailedDescription:
I just looked up and saw the strangest, beautiful orb blinking in the
air so i got my camera.  it's moving around a bit and flashing every
color you could see.  obviously it's also emitting lots of ir.  the
sky was totally clear and the camera could only pick up the "orb" and
the radio tower near it.

i can upload the original high quality version to my ftp server if you want it.

it's recorded from near the asu soccer field on mcclellan drive in the
direction of memphis.

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

thanks,
*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Colorful, extremely fast blinking light drifting about

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the beach ribban in malm��� sweden
lat: 55.599553���
long: 12.956203���
my time is probably off with 50 minutes as my cameras set time probably was of meaning this would have been taken 18:21-18.27

i was looking for anything unusual excpect for the planes that land in coopenhagen. at the same time i was thinking "reveal yourself". i waited for about 5 minutes photographing the sunset.
i saw a dark object in the sky about 35 degrees up and took photos of it. 
i used a canon 30d with a dusty 17-85mm lens. first photo was when i was using full zoom. this is not dust on the lense, i saw the object first and then started to photograph it. at the time i did not use raw photos as the camera was "new" for me.

time between first and last photo is about 6 minutes. object was keeping same speed, altitude and heading. i saw it coming from the east and it passed going north west. lost sight of it as it became to small to see.
i was happy seeing something else than airplanes, that was what i was looking for.

i think it was a weather balloon but it had some rods sticking out and oval shape. if it was a weather balloon it should probably reflect light or be a bit transperent.
i contacted ufo.Se but they dismissed it as "birds" wich i know is very unlikly.

it could have been a weather balloon but i���ll let you decide.
content.summary: Like a balloon but with diagonal rods

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on our way back home heading south where i stopped at a traffic light. something just happened to catch my eye and in the sky right ahead of us was this very strangely shaped object. in my mind i was not thinking "ufo" at all but just "what is that weird thing i am looking at?" it was circular shaped and looked like the sun was reflecting off it in a serious way. i thought it was a plane or weather balloon or something except that i had never seen one with such a bright white light. it almost looked like it was made out of glass or something. the middle of it was not shiny but almost seemed transparent in the clear blue sky. what was most noticeable was the shiny, shiny bright white light.

i said to my husband "what the heck is that??" and pointed. he said "where?" and was looking around but didn't know i meant up in the sky or just wasn't looking in the right place. it was a bit high in the sky - like as high as i might see a plane or helicopter or whatever.
i repeated "right there!" and kept pointing but it started to move horizontally to the left until a nearby tree was crossing the sight of it. i tried to keep my eyes on it and the light turned green so i drove forward so i could get passed the trees to show my husband what i had been looking at. but when i got passed the trees (maybe 5 seconds later) it was nowhere to be seen.
my husband asked "well what did it look like?" so i described the thing and that was when he said "i think you just saw a ufo". after a moments thought i came to the conclusion that he might be right. i had never seen such a thing in my life. when i saw it i genuinely was simply curious as to what this strange thing might be. never in my life might i think i would be reporting such a thing. i am in complete awe of what i saw and can not find any other logical explanation. 
it occurred to me that it could have been some sort of reflection on my wind shield but no matter how i tried i could not re-create the thing. i am about 100% sure that whatever it was it was definitely there in front of us in the sky. at the speed it was traveling there is no feasible explanation as to where it could have disappeared to s quickly either.
content.summary: Bright white circular object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: In my living room watching t.V. when i felt small vibrations & heard a popping sound. i looked out my l.R. window & saw a light so i walked downstairs to the walkway & approximately one & a half blocks away to the west i saw the object moving east very slowly. when the object was half a block from me it stopped & cast a bright light on a small field for about 30 seconds. i wasn't afraid but felt uncomfortable. i watched it float silently back to the west until it was out of sight. it struck me as being strange that no one else came out to see what was going on.The object was so low i thought it might hit the power lines.When i first saw it i thought it might have been a helicopter but, there was no rotors & absolutely no noise.
content.summary: Black,round,silent with no wings,rotors or visible engines

content.detailedDescription:
On jan. 9th 2011 at approxiamately 530 am, my husband and i were in our bedroom sleeping.  our bedroom has a sliding glass door that looks south in our pasture.  i woke up and saw a very bright light about 400 yds from our bedroom door.  the object was "hovering" in the sky.  at first i thought it was a very bright star, but soon after waking up fully, i saw that it wasn't a star.  after a few minutes another object rose out of the trees and it was similar to the first object.  i was extremely excited and scared and i woke up my husband at that point.  we both were looking at the object and i went to find my video camera.

after my wife woke me up i saw two bright objects south of our pasture.  both objects appeared to be a few hundred yards south of our house and the lights were nothing that i have ever seen.  i heard a few planes fly near our house and each time a plane passed within earshot of me, both objects dimmed their lights.  this happened i believe 3 times.  after a bit, not sure how long, the object that rose out of the trees behind our pasture started flying north over our house.  we did not leave our bedroom to see where that object went. the other object continued to hover, but it seemed that it had "spikey" lights around it.  the object seemed to go up in altitude and then stop, this went on again for a while.  my wife was now videotaping and the object had gone up in altitude where we had to move to another part of the house to videotape it.  we video taped it from our dining area window and also our family room window.  at times it seemed that the object would move very fast and then stop suddenly, i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: One ufo hovered, another ufo flew up out of trees, both hovered then one flew north

content.detailedDescription: 12 january 2011 at 1910 hours, i was on the side of my house facing south-east direction, smoking a ciggerette. to the east, i noticed an extreamly bright object believing it was a planet or satelite initially. appeared to be flying between 60,000-80,000 feet. it was a clear, visable sky with no cloud coverage. the light began to blink, slowly from dim to bright approx. ever 10 seconds, after flying directly over me(45 seconds after inital sighting). i knew then that this was not a satelite because it was too bright, moving too fast and i've never seen a satelite blink. not losing sight of this "blinking light", i noticed the sound of a military turbine jet engine. i then saw a small military aircraft flying into the same direction(west) as the "blinking light" at approx. 5,000ft and climbing fast, several miles behind and below blinking light. i believe the military aircraft had just taken off from a local airport, either scottsdale or deer valley airport, but it was not flying in typical flight pattern of the city. continued to watch the "blinking light" after noticing the military aircraft. within 3 minuetes, the "blinking light" and military aircraft's anti-collision light were both in my field of vision. the "blinking light" then changed direction to the north. after 3 minuetes of "blinking light" traveling northern direction, it appeared to hover, remiaing stationary at 60,000-80,000ft. i was able to see the single military jet's anti-collision light still catching up in direction, yet behind "blinking light." at this point, i lit another ciggerette and began to simply watch it "hover" for another 5 minuetes when i lost sight of military jet. 30 seconds after losing sight of military jet, i had to go back inside to answer a call. didn't go back outside when i was able to an hour later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: High altitude, bright blinking light with military jet following.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother pops his head in the door to tell my other brother and i that the international space station is going to make a fly over. 
  when we get outside i was ask "what's that star over there", being an amateur astronomer for over twenty-five years i had immediately noticed as soon as i got out doors that venus was conspicuously  bright in the south west sky. as high and bright as it gets, i had noticed it's bright blue white color and it's position approximately forty degrees above the sw horizon along the ecliptic. i tell them what it is and continue setting up my camera and tripod. the station comes over and the evening is uneventful.
  two days later it hits me that venus is not in the western sky now, at that time i wasn't keeping up with planetary positions but had been out looking at the sky a couple of days earlier. sure enough i open my astronomy software and see that venus is close to the sol in the morning sky.
  there i was with my camera on a tripod with a stationary ufo and didn't get any pictures. i have plenty of pictures of venus and waiting to get an image of the iss i didn't want to setup my camera  for venus when the station was about to come over. too bad i missed this opportunity because i could have gotten some great photos of the object however all that would have been seen would have been a light source in the night sky. i would have liked to get a look at it with my eight inch schmidt cassegrain scope.

observations:
1. the object looked stellar (outside the atmosphere).
2. the object must have been using a lot of energy to put out that much light. 
3. position 40 degrees above sw horizon along the ecliptic.
4. looked exactly like venus, color, brilliance were the same.It was positioned along the ecliptic.  
5. object was not jupiter, mars, sirius, or any of the other bright stars around orion.
6. object was stationary during entire event.
7. three witnesses.
8. location: valley grande, alabama. three miles north of selma, alabama.
9. time: evening astronomical twilight.
content.summary: Ufo resembles venus in south western sky.

content.detailedDescription: At 8:25pm on january 12th 2011 i was walking with my wife and dog when we noticed a bright white light with a red blinking light coming from the south west. as it got closer i could make out a total of three solid white lights in the shape of a triangle with the one red light blinking in the middle.  it appeared to be about the size of my thumb in the sky and was completely silent. it was about the height of where a helicoper would fly,  it was far too low to be an air plane and it was the shape of a triangle. as it turned to the right toward the north east the white lights turned off and all that remained was the blinking red light as it moved through the sky and out of eye sight. the sky was clear and the stars were out. all i could think of is i can't believe i'm seeing this with my wife.
content.summary: Three solid white lights with one blinking red in the middle

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 5 in the morning just staring out the window when i saw a huge blue ball bouncing back and fourth into my vision that's when i ran to my roomates room, he or she wouldn't get up. so i grabbed the recorder and watched this crazy ball dance around and change shapes for several minutes before it shot off...
content.summary: I saw at only 1 blue orb in the sky by the naked eye but when looked at on the disk there were at least four.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the livingroom and my mother was in the kitchen and she yelled out that she heard a helo outside. i didnt think anything of it cause i thought it might be a life flight helo, but when the windows and the pictures started to shake on the walls i jumped up and went outside. when i looked up i saw a very large helo military grade flying low chasing what looked to be a orange light. i yelled for my mother to come out and when i looked back the light and helo was changing directions when the helo banked the light went from being infront of it to being under it. the orange light then took off fast and the helo was right behind it. we came in and called the hospital to make sure it wasnt life flight and they said it shook the windows in the hospital and that the er called to ask if the front desk knew if there was a life flight being called in. the nurse told them no. the er then said they thought it was going to land on the roof of the hospital. the nurse even stated that it did not land at the airport across the street. at first i thought it was a plane being chased but there was only one light and it was orange not the red or green that are fixed to the wing tips.
content.summary: Heard helo went out and saw a military helo chasing a orange light.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to nashville, tn from my home in bruceton, tn. it was an overcast day as you can see in the picture. i was traveling south on hwy 641 in benton co when this beam of light came through the clouds of course i thought at the time it was the sun breaking through. i thought this would be a cool picture so i took out my cell phone and shot the picture never thinking nothing of it other than it being a nice picture. this happened approx. 4-5 yrs ago. today on 1/12/11 for no good reason while watching a program on tv that had absolutely nothing to do with ufos i thought about this picture and how i would like to have it as a background picture for my desktop. so i sent it to my email and downloaded it. when i first saw it enlarged on my computer i thought it was a speck of dirt on the screen then after close inspection of it i now think i may have inadvertently caught a ufo in the picture. i may be wrong but i don't think so. take a look and with better software than i have maybe you can figure out what it is.
content.summary: This event was captured on my cell phone. i was taking a picture of the beam of light coming through the clouds not the object in the pic.

content.detailedDescription: I live on the third floor of an apartment that perfectly overlooks portland, me airport. i went out on my back porch to have a cigarette, and when i looked up i saw a very clear bright light that resembled a star, but wss clearly not a star in the sky above the airport. i became excited and continued viewing the object, looking for any signs of movement, sound or anything that would resemble a planes movement. the object was going from shining yellow light to a mixture of red light that would fade in and out blending with the yellow.  i estimated the object to be hovering at maybe 1000-1500 feet above the airport, and it sat comletely still for around four minutes. oddly, when i started questioning in my mind what i was seeing andthe validity of the object, it slowly and almost impossibly smoothly started moving from left to right in my view, still shining, at this point i ran inside and attempted to quickly find a phone number for the local news channel. after a minute or two i got the number and ran outside only to find the object was no longer there. i attemped to take a picture with my cellphone but it was just too far away to show up. i ended up calling the news and basically chickening out telling them what i saw due to fear of being possibly ridiculed. i have never in my life seen anyhting i would consider a ufo until now, and i feel the need to report it to this site. i never in my life wish i had some sort of video camera more then i do now, because at the distance i was from the object i would have been able to get incredible footage with any type of zoom whatsoever. what angers me even more is i bought a video camera about a month ago just for the reason of you never know what your going to see. i had brought it back to the store th enext day because i just didnt have the money for it, and figured it would be useless to me anyways. big mistake on my part...
content.summary: Bright light hovering over portland int'l airport

content.detailedDescription: I walked out back and scanned the sky, from the north i saw a light like a white landing light of an airplane...Tyler pounds regional airport is about 3mi from my location...I have been watching air traffic for more than 20 years.This light was moving towards the east at a above normal pace.....At that point it was on my 12oclock....I entered my building on the west side grabbed my binoculars at the front door...Maybe 10-15 seconds it was on my 3oclock....I tracked it for a few seconds and within a period of 2-3 seconds it shifted color gradually from white to red and gone....At no point did it exibit red or green clearance lights and it appeared to cross paths with an approching aircraft which had all of its required lights illuminated...This is what was so unusual....I don't recall seeing an aircraft in my area that did not have the red and green and beacons flashing....I have seen speeds comprable to this as i have been in the military...But then i really dont know how far away it was...It was'nt "oh my god" fast...But alot faster than normal air traffic.This object stayed about the same size the whole time.
content.summary: White light like a airplane but no red or green moving fast changed to red then gone

content.detailedDescription: Strange lights reported to 911 in newton alabama, military response.
content.summary: Correction to date of sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I was in third grade and it was recess at roosevelt elementary school on third ave in great falls montana usa. it was sunny, no wind and warm. a boy said look at the rainbow and pointed up. it was a round rainbow very low in the sky and solid. 
the school bell rang indicating that recess was over. i was always one of the first ones in line after the bell rang. i remember running but when i got to the line everyone was already lined up in front of me.  my class mates asked me where i had been, they were waiting for me. my friend h came running up behind me with a strange look on her face.  
i estimate that i lost about 2-5 minutes of time.
i also remember a ���dream���. i was being made to do mental tests in a dark area with a metal walk way. i was not allowed to look at the ���observers��� they were shorter than me and scared me, i did not get a warm or friendly feeling from them.  they didn���t seem to care very much about me or any of the other children taking the tests.
i remember two tests. one was a small box, you were not allowed to touch the box, it floated and you had to turn it with your mind but there was only one correct way of turning the box.  you couldn���t leave until you move the box the right way, if you moved it wrong something happened but i don���t remember.  the final answer of how to turn the box was inside out. i remember being walked down a hallway my hands were at my side and i could not move them, the ���observer(s)��� was behind me. i looked to my right and i saw a boy my age with dark hair, he was wearing pajamas and he could not figure out the box. we were not allowed to talk and i was not allowed to stop but i thought the answer and turned the box for him anyway, he turned around and smiled at me as i was made to move on.
the second test was scary. i was tied back to back with another girl. we could stand up and i remember feeling like i was being watched from the upper right hand corner of the ���room��� it was black and the room looked like it could have been very big but maybe that is just because it was so dark. burning sticks of fire would fly at us and we were meant to move them away using our minds, if they touched us they burned, or felt like it. our hands were tied so we could not use them to defend against the sticks. i tried to throw the fire back towards the ���observers��� i was very mad at them.
have not had any other dreams similar or seen a ufo since.
thanks for listening. i recently found my friend h on facebook, she remembers the rainbow too.
content.summary: Round rainbow low in sky, time lost, mental tests.

content.detailedDescription: Strange lights were reported to have been seen by many people in the area of newton alabama. many 911 calls came in. my husband, who works on fort rucker, called me to say that some military operations were shut down because of these lights. people he works with reported they had seen many black government vehicles rushing to the newton area where these lights were being reported. one co worker said he found his truck had been moved unexplainably to the end of his driveway when he woke up this morning. my husband also said the military was already trying to keep a lid on this event, and telling people not to talk about it. nothing in the news at this time. i am still seeking more information.
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription:
In mid-december, 2010 around 10:00pm i watched what looked like a reddish, orange fireball moving slowly across the sky. it had a short tail that was also red - orange looking much like a flame. the tail appeared to be moving back and fourth quickly almost like a fish swimming. it seemed to be going in a straight line, due north. i do not believe it was a meteor as it seemed to be travelling much more slowly; about the speed of an airplane. i heard no sound from it at all. it took probably a minute or a little less to cross the sky and disappear behind the tree line. 
location: live oak, florida, usa.
content.summary: Reddish orange fireball with tail travelling slowly north. dec, 2010. live oak, florida.

content.detailedDescription: They are in the original format as taken with my samsung cell phone. thank you..
content.summary: These are the ones i should have sent

content.detailedDescription:
Cadillac quebec is a small town up north. i don't remember much of that place as being memorable except my ufo encounter. my brother and i were coming back from a friends house about 9-ish that night. i was doubling him on my handle bars. we were talking about school, girls..Things 14 year old boys talk about.

the area of this town was dark, but there were plenty of houses around.We were near home, we were looking at the ground (since riding a bike in the dark is tricky) and suddenly the ground around us was illuminated in red light. now i don't remember if my memory serves me right here, but i recollect the lights near by fading just before it hapened. we both were immersed in the red light.  we looked up quickly and saw a cigar shaped ufo flying really low to the ground. about 80 feet to the roofs of the houses below them.The object was going 40kmh (aprox). the ufo had to be 30-40 feet long. it passed over our house which was a few yards away from where we were standing,the ufo lit everything below it in a red light. what still amazes me today is: thinking about it, the fact that there wasn't a single sound. like, it didn't have a motor/engine of sorts or displaced any air.

the undercarriage of the object looked more like molten lava which is where the light came from. the top wasn't visible much because the light from below blocked a clear view. 
 
it made a straight path to the tree tops of the forest a few feet away from our yard. always in a straight line, no sound.

i am 29 now but in my mind i still see it as it passed over the trees. every branch of the tress lit up. revealing every detail of the tree trunks and branches in red light and then as it passed the return of the dark. gives me the creeps.

i must say that since that day, i have a keen interest in ufo/alien subjects and research it like you all do. i just wanted to tell you what i saw and how i became "aware" i don't like to use the term believer.
content.summary: Flew low to the ground, glown red light over houses and trees about 80 of the ground
